bookSourceComment:
🔍换源搜索建议开启加载详情页，关闭加载目录，因为大部分加了最近更新时间

🔍✿与❍ 标识为VIP章节

🔍源分组（源名称做过修改，比较文艺）
🌕 正版  起点晋江源，默认搜索开启
🐣 备用与发现  与此源紧挨着上面的源一般是一个源站，默认搜索关闭
🌙 正版  付费正版源
⭐ 正版  免费正版源
🌾 男频，🌾 女频  本人常用源
🎫 a-pi   APP源
🪐 绅士  十八禁源
🏷️ 论坛  一些论坛源
🐑此标识下的分组均为网文分组
💬此标识下的分组均为出版分组
🗨️此标识下的分组均为轻小说分组
🎟️此标识下的分组均为漫画分组
🎋此标识下的分组均为有声分组
🔖 其他  一些其他的源
exploreUrl:
由于个人原因仅开启部分发现，多属于正版书源


使用者有需要可于书源管理中开启发现


建议进入注释查看更多书源使用说明

bookSourceComment:
◇默认搜索开启
◇如需启用webView，点击设置源变量填写数字1确认，刷新
◇数字1启用webView，0则是不启用
◇默认不启用
◇登录以后正文获取失败可以启用试试，保存后记得更新目录，否则无效
◇在正文规则后添加可看作话
<js>
a=java.getString('@@class.author-say-wrap@p!-1@text');
t=java.getString('@@class.author-say-wrap@p.-1@text');
if(a.match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/)){
a='【作话】\n'+a
}
result=result+'\n'+a+'\n'+t
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: ##作者：</aria>([^<]+)<aria##$1###
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
@@##span>连载至([^<]+)##$1###
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: ##"book-title">([^<]+)</h2##$1###

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    text:"📖["+String(booklet.vN).replace(/.共\d+章.*|.订阅本卷/g,'')+"]📖",
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"✿·":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        text: String(vip+chapter.cN).replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]?/g,''),
        href: href,
        time:String(chapter.uT)+"｜"+String(chapter.cnt)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

<js>
a=java.getString('@@class.author-say-wrap@p@text');
if(a.match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/)){
a='\n【作话】\n'+a
}
result=result+a
</js>

ruleSearch.author: .author .name@text||p.0@a.0@text
ruleSearch.lastChapter:
.update@text##最新更新\s<js>result.replace(/·/,' • ')</js>
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
ruleSearch.name: h2@text||h4 a@text||tag.a.1@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    text:"📖["+String(booklet.vN).replace(/.共\d+章.*|.订阅本卷/g,'')+"]📖",
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"❍·":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        text: String(vip+chapter.cN).replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,''),
        href: href,
        time:String(chapter.uT)+"｜"+String(chapter.cnt)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◌"+intro+"．
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【作话】\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} flag_comment=source.getVariable() //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ if(flag_comment==1){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>25?25:list.length; for(i=0;i

  u=tag=="lx♀"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=2&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 
 }catch(e){}

obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]

<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'').replace(/第(\s)?[零一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+(\s)?章|(C|c)hapter(\s)?(\d)+|^\d+/g,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;
num=!type?$.chapterid+"｜":'';
/*if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}*/
title=type?'📖['+title+']📖':title;
v=vip?'❍·':'';l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=v+num+title+l;
</js>
<js>result.replace(/(\d+)｜\s*$/,'第$1章').replace(/\d+｜第(.+)章/,'第$1章').replace(/\d+\｜Chapter/,'Chapter').replace(/❍·📖/,'📖')</js>

 }catch(e){}

<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'').replace(/第(\s)?[零一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+(\s)?章|(C|c)hapter(\s)?(\d)+|^\d+/g,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?$.chapterid+"｜":'';
/*if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}*/
title=type?'📖['+title+']📖':title;
v=vip?'❍·':'';l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=v+num+title+l;
</js>
<js>result.replace(/(\d+)｜\s*$/,'第$1章').replace(/\d+｜第(.+)章/,'第$1章').replace(/\d+\｜Chapter/,'Chapter').replace(/❍·📖/,'📖')</js>

		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定

obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'').replace(/第(\s)?[零一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+(\s)?章|(C|c)hapter(\s)?(\d)+|^\d+/g,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?$.chapterid+"｜":'';
/*if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}*/
title=type?'📖['+title+']📖':title;
v=vip?'❍·':'';l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=v+num+title+l;
</js>
<js>result.replace(/(\d+)｜\s*$/,'第$1章').replace(/\d+｜第(.+)章/,'第$1章').replace(/\d+\｜Chapter/,'Chapter').replace(/❍·📖/,'📖')</js>

score@put:{updateAt:$.updateAt}<js>
var score = result =="0"? "【无人评价】": "好评率"+(result > 10 ? result:result*10)+"%";
"最近于 " +"@get:{updateAt}".slice(0,10)+" 日更新"
+" • " 
+"共"+parseInt({{$.countWord}}/10000)+'万字'
+ " • " 
+score;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
需关闭精准搜索
可搜索书名或作者名
关键词第一优先级为男女主角的准确名字
其它关键词为较频繁的龙套名或地点名、道具名、事件
多个关键词以空格分隔，页面只列出满足所有关键词的结果
可以在关键词前面加zj:表示搜索主角名
例如：zj:韩立
支持按后宫人数检索，数字1~20，超过20按20
例如：zj:韩立 hg:5，表示只列出后宫人数大于等于5的小说
可以设置人数区间，如：zj:韩立 hg:5~10
后宫人数可能不准确，建议放宽范围

function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    latest: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      ),
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
      
    ].join(','),
    latest:
      o.updteChapterName + ' • ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
    	
    	
      name: (o.level+o.chapterName).replace(/^1/,'✿·').replace(/^0/, '').replace(/正文\s+/, '').replace(/vip卷\s+/, '').replace(/(第.+卷)?.*\s第/, '第'),
      url:
        'http://book.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
    
    };
  });
</js>

header:
<js>
(()=>{
	var timestamp = Math.round(Date.now()/1000);
	var deviceIdentify = "26dc537032a3e3791ae9e85bc0c443847";
	var sign = java.md5Encode(deviceIdentify+timestamp+"9495ef469eb3e7ae8ef3").toUpperCase();
	var header = {
		"deviceIdentify":String(deviceIdentify),
		"signature":String(sign),
		"timestamp":String(timestamp)
		};
		return JSON.stringify(header)
})()
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
// 工具类
var key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
var iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
var aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
var RandomUtil = Packages.cn.hutool.core.util.RandomUtil
// 参数
let userInfo = source.getLoginInfoMap()
let username = userInfo['手机号码/邮箱']
let password = userInfo['密码']
let app_version = "2.9.290"
let device_token = `shuke_${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(15)}`
let login_token = RandomUtil.randomString(32)
let account = `%E4%B9%A6%E5%AE%A2${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(12)}`
let uuid = `android${java.randomUUID()}`
let params = `app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`

// 账号登录
function login(params, username, password){
  var loginUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/login?${params}&login_name=${username}&passwd=${password}`
  var autoRegUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/auto_reg?oauth_union_id=&app_version=${app_version}&gender=1&oauth_open_id=&device_token=${device_token}&channel=TX&oauth_type=&uuid=${uuid}`
  // 是否游客
  let isLogin = !source.getLoginHeader()
  let isAuto = username == '' && password == ''
  if(isAuto && !isLogin ){ 
     throw new Error("请勿重复登录,如若需要请清除登录头和Cookie")
  }
  var url = isAuto ? autoRegUrl : loginUrl
  // 获取登录信息
  let res = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(java.ajax(url)))
  if(res.tip) throw new Error(res.tip)
  let login_token = res.data.login_token
  let user_code = res.data.user_code
  let reader_name = res.data.reader_info.reader_name
  let account = res.data.reader_info.account
  let rest_hlb = res.data.prop_info.rest_hlb
  java.toast(`${reader_name}【剩余欢乐币:${rest_hlb}】,登录成功!`)
  // 获取书架
  let bookList = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/bookshelf/get_shelf_list?app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`)
  let shelf_list = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(bookList)).data.shelf_list[0]
  let shelf_id = shelf_list.shelf_id
  let reader_id = shelf_list.reader_id
  // 登录完成
  let header = {
    "app_version": String(app_version),
    "device_token": String(device_token),
    "login_token": String(login_token),
    "account": encodeURIComponent(account),
    "user_code": String(user_code),
    "shelf_id": String(shelf_id),
    "reader_name": encodeURIComponent(reader_name),
    "reader_id": String(reader_id)
  }
  return JSON.stringify(header)
}
// 写入登录头
source.putLoginHeader(login(params,username.trim(),password.trim()))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
// 解密
function decrypt(str1, str2){
  let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray(java.digestBase64Str(str2,"sha256"))
  let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
  let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
  return aes.decryptStr(str1)
}
// 获取密钥
let app_version = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['app_version']
let account = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['account']
let login_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['login_token']
let key = "zG2nSeEfSHfvTCHy5LCcqtBbQehKNLXn"
let cid = baseUrl.match(/chapter_id=(.*)/)[1]
let result = JSON.parse(decrypt(result,key))
let tip = result.tip
if(tip){
 java.toast(tip)
 throw new Error(tip)	
}
let cmd = result.data.command
// 正文内容
let body = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_cpt_ifm?chapter_command=${cmd}&app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${cid}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`)
let txt = JSON.parse(decrypt(body,key)).data.chapter_info.txt_content
decrypt(txt,cmd)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
// 解密
let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
let app_version = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['app_version']
let account = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['account']
let login_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['login_token']
let device_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['device_token']
// 章节列表
let res = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(result))
if(res.tip) { 
   java.toast(res.tip)
   throw new Error(res.tip)
}
let chList = []
res.data.chapter_list.forEach(volList => {
 chList.push({title: '📖['+volList.division_name+']📖',voltype: true})
 volList.chapter_list.forEach(item=>{
   chList.push({
    cid: item.chapter_id,

    
    title:String(item.is_paid+item.chapter_title).replace(/^1/,'✿·').replace(/^0/, '').replace(/(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,''),
    
    

    isPay: item.auth_access,
    url: `https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_chapter_command?app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${item.chapter_id}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}&device_token=${device_token}`,
    info: `更新时间 ${item.mtime} 字数 ${item.word_count}`
   })
 })
})
chList
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.正文乱码或空需登录刷新正文（登录以后点一下发现里的『我的书架』）
2.建议预下载为1章
3.网站限制频繁访问
4.（因为阅读会预下载大概率会频繁访问）频繁访问后如果出现乱码或空，请隔十多分钟再刷新
『❗️太频繁可能IP不可用，所以最好不要离线缓存，正文出现乱码过空登录了并且隔十几分钟还是一直显示乱码正文，这时可以试试换个网络』
▼能不能看随缘

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []
    let v = []
  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-1){
    	array.push({
    		name:'📖['+x.volume_name+']📖',
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
            url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=1976'
      })
    })
  }
  array
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
 loadDocType="{{@@body@data-doctype}}";
 loadType="{{@@body@data-randomtype}}";
sid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+).html/)[1];
url=baseUrl.replace(/\d+.html/,'')

var section = {
    loadDocType: loadDocType,
    loadType: loadType,
    sid:sid,
    content: {
        childNode: [],
        
        init: function(c){
            this.body=c
            if (section.loadType == 'normal') {
      this.load(String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))))
            } else if (section.loadType == 'substep') {
                var d = 'r' + section.sid;
                var f = false;
                if (section.loadDocType == 'xml') {
                    d += '.xml'
                } else if (section.loadDocType == 'json') {
                    d += '.json';
                    f = true
                } else {
                    return false
                };        
             cookie="PHPSESSID="+java.get(baseUrl,{}).cookie("PHPSESSID");
            token= java.get(url+d,{"X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest","referer":baseUrl,"cookie":String(cookie)}).header("token")                
                	this.load(token)      	
            } else {
                return false
            };               
        },
        load: function(a) {         
            a = String(java.base64Decode(a)).split(/[A-Z]+%/);      
            var b = 0,
            start = 0;
            for (var i = 0; i < this.body.length; i++) {
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/h2/i)) {
                    start = i + 1
                };
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/div/i)&& this.body[i].attr("class") != 'chapter') {
                    break
                }
            };
          
            for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
                if (a[i] < 5) {
                    this.childNode[a[i]] = this.body[i + start];
                      b++
                } else {
                    this.childNode[a[i] - b] = this.body[i + start]                 
                }
            };
  }
}
}
section.content.init(java.getElement("@@id.content@children!0").toArray());
section.content.childNode.join("")
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
url="https://www.yodu.org/login.php?do=submit&jumpurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yodu.org%2F";
uname=userInfo['用户名'];
pwd=userInfo['密码'];
body="username="+uname+"&password="+pwd+"&usecookie=315360000&action=login&submit=%C2%A0%E7%99%BB%C2%A0%C2%A0%E5%BD%95%C2%A0";
cookies=java.post(url,body,{}).cookies();
Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/,/g,';')
Cookie={
	"Cookie":String(Cookies)
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));

if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.ywpxg.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
//java.log(url)
result=url;</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};
book;
</js>

header:
<js>
(()=>{
	var ua = "navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase(); 			return { 				'mobile': !!(ua.match(/applewebkit.*mobile.*/) || ua.match(/iemobile/) || ua.match(/windows phone/) || ua.match(/android/) || ua.match(/iphone/) || ua.match(/ipad/)), 				'weixin': ua.indexOf('micromessenger') > -1 			};";
	var heders = {"User-Agent": ua};
	return JSON.stringify(heders);
})()
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
String(result)
.replace(/\s*发表于\s*/g," 🕡 ")
.replace(/回复:『\s*/g,'回复:『')
.replace(/([cC])hanter((\s)?\d+)/g,'$1hapter$2')
</js>
##以下内容需要积分高于 \d+ 才可浏览

ruleExplore.author: tag.cite.0@a@text||tag.cite.0@text

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://www.mtslash.me":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'http://www.mtslash.me/misc.php?mod=ranklist&type=thread&view='+url+'&orderby=all':u;
 u=tag=="t"?'http://www.mtslash.me/misc.php?mod=ranklist&type=thread&view='+url+'&orderby=today':u;
  u=tag=="w"?'http://www.mtslash.me/misc.php?mod=ranklist&type=thread&view='+url+'&orderby=thisweek':u;
  u=tag=="m"?'http://www.mtslash.me/misc.php?mod=ranklist&type=thread&view='+url+'&orderby=thismonth':u;
 
 
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url=baseUrl+'/limit18';
value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(java.getCookie(baseUrl,null));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);
result=String(java.ajax(Url))
}else{result=result}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.1@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://hongxiuzhao.me":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];


 
  u=tag=="cat2"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/2/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat0"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/0/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat1"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/1/0':u;
 u=tag=="tag"?'https://hongxiua.com/tags/'+url+'/{{page}}':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#articlecontent@p") }else{ eval(String(java.ajax("http://www.ztgauntong.com/17mb/js/cryptojs_min.js"))); function d(a, b) { b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8) } result=eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); }}

<js>

//工具函数
options ={
  "headers": {
    "Referer": baseUrl
  }
}
function add(url, options) {
  return !options ? url : `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}`;
}
String.prototype.add=function (){return add(this, arguments[0])};


//获取验证码
img =`https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getVerify/?d=${Math.random()}`
code=java.getVerificationCode((img+"").add(options))

//拼接链接
b="https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getChapterList/"
aid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)\/$/)[1]
options=Object.assign(options,{
  "body": `verify=${code}&aid=${aid}&sbt=提交`,
  "method": "POST"
})
b.add(options)

</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>

//工具函数
options ={
  "headers": {
    "Referer": baseUrl
  }
}
function add(url, options) {
  return !options ? url : `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}`;
}
String.prototype.add=function (){return add(this, arguments[0])};


//获取验证码
img =`https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getVerify/?d=${Math.random()}`
code=java.getVerificationCode((img+"").add(options))

//拼接链接
b="https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getChapterList/"
aid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)\/$/)[1]
options=Object.assign(options,{
  "body": `verify=${code}&aid=${aid}&sbt=提交`,
  "method": "POST"
})
b.add(options)

</js>

content={ childNode:[], childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)?java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray():"", UpWz:function(m, i) { var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); k = Math.ceil(m - k); return k }, load:function(){ this.code=String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; var e =String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); this.childNode[k]=this.childNodes[i] }} } if(baseUrl.match(/verify/)){ result="如果没获取到目录，说明验证码不对，详情页刷新重新获取验证码" }else{if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result=content.childNode.join("
");}else{ result=java.getElements("#chaptercontent@p") } }

exploreUrl:
<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=["标   签::::1",
" NP ::np::4::a",
"父子::父子::4::a",
"兄弟::兄弟::4::a",
"年上::年上::4::a",
"校园::校园::4::a",
" B E ::BE::4::a",
"出轨::出轨::4::a",
"生子::生子::4::a",
"年下::年下::4::a",
"双性::双性::4::a",
"ABO::ABO::4::a",
"强强::强强::4::a",
"哥哥::哥哥::4::a",
"反攻::反攻::4::a",
"强制::强制::4::a",
"掰弯::掰弯::4::a",
"高 h::高h::4::a",
"主攻::主攻::4::a",
"互攻::互攻::4::a",
"快穿::快穿::4::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>
